product_name: Columbia Bugababy Interchange 3-in-1 Bunting - Infant Boys'
long_description: The Columbia Bugababy Interchange 3-in-1 bunting with zip-in fleece liner provides versatility and dry, warm comfort for your baby. Omni-Tech(R) waterproof breathable nylon shell and taped critical seams offer protection from rain and snow. Polyester fleece liner offers lofty, warm insulation that dries quickly and continues to insulate even when damp. Your baby can wear either the shell or fleece liner separately, or zip them together on cold winter days. Fold-over flaps envelop feet and hands for extra protection from the cold. Adjustable storm hood adds warmth. Shell is lined with smooth taffeta. The Columbia Bugababy Interchange 3-in-1 bunting features a full-front zipper that runs from the neck to the lower left leg and opens wide for easy dressing.
short_description: The Columbia Bugababy Interchange 3-in-1 bunting with zip-in fleece liner provides versatility and dry, warm comfort for your baby.
subcategory: Kids' Snowsuits, Rain Suits And Buntings
